main.title: About
main.subtitle: Project information
main.first_paragraph: This project is a web application developed to offer an intuitive and practical interface, allowing users to generate QR Codes quickly and efficiently. The main goal is to enable anyone to enter text or a link and, with just one click, obtain a corresponding QR Code, ready to download and share.
main.second_paragraph: The Web App has been designed with a focus on simplicity and accessibility, ensuring that even users without technical knowledge can use it without difficulties.
main.third_paragraph: We also have a button that allows the user to easily switch the page's language, providing a better understanding of the information contained in the app according to the user's preferred language.

subtopic.title: Curiosity
subtopic.subtitle: About the creation of the QRCODE
subtopic.description: A QR Code (Quick Response Code) is a two-dimensional code that stores data in a pattern of black and white modules arranged in a square matrix. It is based on Reed-Solomon encoding for error correction, allowing it to be read even if it is partially damaged.
